content: ssk k to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog k2 ssk k to end of round 4 sts decreased work 3 rounds even work a decrease round followed by 2 even rounds twice 6 rounds total work a decrease round followed by 1 even round three times 6 rounds total work the toe decrease round 1 2 2 3 4 more times 8 8 10 10 8 stitches remain to finish cut yarn draw through the final stitches and tighten weave in ends © kate atherley 2005-2011 all rights reserved www wisehildaknits com
